sentences.sContent: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.sCn: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

sentences.sContent: a tendency among Americans to get married at a later age
...Fantasy proneness could be considered a tendency to imagine and daydream...
...But chances are it won’t have much impact on the human tendency to resolve to get to the gym more and avoid chocolate cake when the clock strikes midnight on December 31...

remMethod.val: tend(趋向) ＋ ency(表状态) → 倾向， 趋向

words.tran: 有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向

trans.tranOther: if sb/sth has a particular tendency , they are likely to behave or act in a particular way
